colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @010B ('DI LA RLUNG DANG KLUNG ZHES YOD PA DON 'DRA BA 'AM, GANG LTAR YANG SNGA MA YI GE LTAR BYAS TE, MCHOG GSUM SPYI LA MCHOD PA'I SGO NAS RLUNG RTA DAR BYED PA'I CHO GA 'DI NI CHEN PO HOR YUL GYI GRVA RIGS BLO BZANG LUNG RTOGS RNAM RGYAL @011A *, ,GNYIS KYIS RLUNG RTA'I BSKANG BSHAGS CIG GYIS DNGOS PO'I SKYES DANG BCAS YANG YANG NAN GYIS BSKUL BA'I MOS NGOR, BTZUN GZUGS NGAG DBANG THUB BSTAN RGYA MTSOS RANG LO BSHAGS NAS YAR KHRAL TZAM DU BRIS PA NI DPYOD LDAN DGE SLONG BSAM 'GRUB MING CAN BGYIS PA'O, ,DGE LEGS 'PHEL, ,SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,DGE'O, ,)
